inclusion.criterion: Women and men with RA, AS and other inflammatory forms of arthritis
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Cholesterol plaques demonstrated in carotid artery by ultrasound
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Arterial fibrillation or others with chronic irregular heart rhythm (because of CT)
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient has severe stenosis in the left internal carotid artery and moderate stenosis in the right internal carotid artery. He is physically active and does not use lipid-lowering medications.
